mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, ID, MESSAGEID, INQUIRYID, SHOPID, STATUS, ITEMID, ITEMPICTUREURL, VIEWPURCHASEDITEMURL, TRANSACTIONID, ORDERID, CLAIMAMOUNT, BUYER, BUYERREQUESTED, CREATIONDATE, LASTACTION, LASTACTOR, LASTDESCRIPTION, LASTDATE, APISTATUS, APIDATE, APIDESCR from DB_EBAYINQUIRY where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
